xuiUnitConversionService
service in module xui

Description

Service that provides generic unit conversion features.

Methods

  • convert(value, base, precision)

    Convert value base.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    valuenumber

    Items to sort.

    basenumber

    Conversion base (typically 1000 or 1024).

    precisionnumber

    Precision of formatted value. Extra trailing zeros are removed independently of the precision.

    (default: 1)

    Returns
    IUnitConversionResult

    result of a convertation which consists of converted value (string) and its order (number).
